term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - conservation of orbital symmetry
term.title: conservation of orbital symmetry

item.text: The orbital symmetry control of concerted reactions; this requires transformation of the molecular orbitals of reactants into those of products to proceed continuously by following a reaction path along which the symmetry of these orbitals remains unchanged. Reactions which adhere to this requirement are classified as symmetry-allowed reactions, and those which do not as symmetry-forbidden reactions.
